data.eml:eml: Corrections and emendations to the description of Deltamys araucaria Quintela et al., 2017 (Rodentia, Cricetidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pardiñas, Ulyses F. J. (2018): Corrections and emendations to the description of Deltamys araucaria Quintela et al., 2017 (Rodentia, Cricetidae). Zootaxa 4379 (1): 134-136, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4379.1.8
